ðŸ“– Summary: S3Sync is a Go-based tool designed for high-speed synchronization of files to and from S3-compatible storage. It supports multi-threaded uploading/downloading and offers flexible filtering options, making it suitable for managing large numbers of small files. It can sync between S3 and local filesystems, or directly between S3 buckets.
